name: Italian
info: Jalapeno peppers, double pepperoni, ricotta cheese

name: Pepperoni
info: Your choice of crust covered with our signature pizza sauce, real cheese made from mozzarella, and pepperoni.

name: Hawaiian
info: Pineapple, Canadian bacon, Wisconsin mozzarella, fresh ham

name: Veggie
info: Fresh spinach, bell peppers, pickles, white onions, Roma tomatoes, mushrooms

name: Sushi
info: Slightly crispy yet chewy fried rice patty as the base topped with a layer of sliced avocado, a layer of sliced salmon, tuna or crab meat

name: Mushroom
info: A white pizza covered with mozzarella cheese, goat cheese, and fresh herbs

name: Tomato
info: Pizza topped with juicy fresh tomatoes and olives is simple, classic, and totally satisfying.

name: Cheese
info: Real cheese made from mozzarella on top of our signature pizza sauce with your choice of crust, then baked to a golden brown
